data.subject: USE OF OTHER THAN FULL AND OPEN COMPETITION FOR AN ACQUISITION UNDER THE SIMPLIFIED ACQUISITION THRESHOLD
data.reference: (a) USNS ROBERT E PEARY (T-AKE 5) PR Number(s): N231955131W123
data.background_1: In considering the references, FAR 13.106-1(b)(1)(i) states for purchases not exceeding the simplified acquisition threshold, Contacting Officers may solicit from one source if the Contracting Officer determines that, under the circumstances of the contract action, only one source is reasonably available (e.g., urgency, exclusive licensing, brand-name, or industrial mobilization).
data.background_2: As required by FAR 13.106-3(b)(3)(i), this memorandum explains the absence of competition for this acquisition because only one source will be solicited for this requirement (or for a portion of the requirement) and the requirement is not expected to exceed the simplified acquisition threshold.
data.description_1: Provide a description of the item or service required, to include
data.item_a: The name of the required source or brand name:
data.item_b: The required delivery date/period of performance and:
data.item_c_value: TO REPAIR THE NO.2 & 4 MOORING WINCH
data.description_2: List the source(s) or known vendor(s) who are able to provide the above-described item or service.
data.section_III_title: THE DETERMINATION FOR USE OF OTHER THAN FULL AND OPEN COMPETITION IS BASED ON THE FOLLOWING (select all that apply):
data.restrictive_rights_text: the source has established proprietary rights, limited rights in data, patent rights, copyrights, or secret processes in the item or service.

data.restrictive_rights_explanation: MACGREGOR USA INC. OWNS PROPRIETARY RIGHTS TO THE DRAWINGS OF THE MATERIAL.
data.exclusive_licensing_agreements_text: The item or service is only available from the Original Equipment Manufacturer (OEM), or there is ONLY ONE authorized distributor or technical representative for the OEM.
data.critical_ship_equipment_text: The required item is critical ship equipment, the failure of which poses a hazard to the ship, the crew or the environment.
data.standardization_brand_name_text: Per MSCs standardization initiative, only the specified make/model of the equipment/parts will satisfy the Government’s needs for additional units or replacement items.
data.make_model_numbers: SINGLE DRUM MOORING WINCH M2 & M4; MODEL# 03-136186/00
data.form_fit_function_text: Item is direct replacement parts / components for existing equipment and must be compatible in terms of form, fit, and function with existing equipment / configurations.

data.compatibility_description: Part must be able to fit into tight location as per “all ready to install” part. Any modification to parameter may result in part no being able to be installed without further equipment modification.
data.other_reasons_text: MSC does not have manufacturing and technical information required to evaluate and determine whether non-OEM components and replacement parts offered are equivalent to the OEM components and replacement parts. The OEM rep has access to provide parts and technical data / drawings from the original manufacturer, as required to properly repair and maintain the equipment.
data.urgency_text: The supplies or services are of such unusual and compelling urgency that the Government would be seriously injured unless the agency is permitted to limit the number of sources from which it solicits. Urgent requirements are supplies or services that will result in work stoppage or are mission critical and the routine processing time would injure the Government.
data.urgency_explanation: Timely delivery by the service date is essential to clear the casualty report and enhance redundancy for mooring the vessel.

data.technical_requirement_certification: I certify that the facts and representation under my cognizance which are included in this justification are complete and accurate to the best of my knowledge and belief.
